name: HTML 5
tooltip: The standard language for creating and structuring web pages

name: CSS 3
tooltip: A stylesheet language used to design and style web pages

name: JavaScript
tooltip: A versatile programming language for interactive web development

name: TypeScript
tooltip: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing for better scalability

name: React.js
tooltip: A JavaScript library for building fast and interactive user interfaces

name: Sass
tooltip: A CSS preprocessor that extends CSS with variables, mixins, and more

name: Regex
tooltip: A sequence of characters for pattern matching in text

name: Three.js
tooltip: A JavaScript library for creating 3D graphics in the browser using WebGL

name: Git
tooltip: A distributed version control system for tracking code changes

name: Github
tooltip: A platform for hosting and collaborating on Git repositories

name: Jasmine
tooltip: A testing framework for writing and running JavaScript unit tests

name: Datadog
tooltip: A monitoring and security platform for cloud applications

name: Figma
tooltip: A collaborative design tool for UI/UX prototyping and wireframing

name: Airtable
tooltip: A flexible database tool that combines spreadsheets with database features

name: Zapier
tooltip: An automation tool for connecting apps and workflows without coding

name: Asana
tooltip: A project management tool for team collaboration and task tracking
